prompt:
Nurse: Hello. I'm calling about your upcoming total knee replacement. Is this a good time to talk?

Patient: Sure.

Nurse: Great, thank you for taking the time to speak with me. How has your day been so far?

Patient: It's been alright. How about you?

Nurse: As an AI, I don't have personal experiences, but I'm here to assist you. I'm glad to hear your day has been alright. It's critical to stay positive, especially as you prepare for your upcoming procedure. Are you managing to keep busy today?

Patient: Yeah.

Nurse: That's good to hear. Keeping busy can help make the time pass more quickly. I'm sure you must be looking forward to getting a new knee.

Patient: Yeah. I guess so.

responses.gpt4: It must be exciting to think about all the things you'll be able to do once your knee is feeling better. Do you have any specific activities you're looking forward to?
responses.our_model: That's good to hear. Keeping busy can help make the time pass more quickly. I'm sure you must be looking forward to getting a new knee. Do you have any plans for what you'd like to do once you've recovered from your surgery?
